```{r yo, include=FALSE}
library(magick)

pic.path <- "teaser/"
pic.files <- list.files(pic.path, full.names = T)

pics <- image_read(pic.files) 
pics <- image_scale(pics, "1024x512")

#animation <- image_animate(image_morph(pics, frames = 3), fps = 1)
animation1 <- image_animate(pics, fps = 0.4)
image_write(animation1, "teaser_flickrstory.gif")

```
